ExecutableTestSuite.label: Conformance class: GML application schemas, Utility and Government Services
ExecutableTestSuite.description:
This test suite examines the GML encoding of spatial objects specified in the INSPIRE GML application schema 'Utility and Government Services'. Both currently approved GML application schema versions (3.0 and 4.0) are tested.

This is a draft version. It has limitations and is expected to contain errors. Please report any issues or problems in GitHub.

Known limitations are documented in the description of the applicable test case or test assertion. There is a general limitation in all assertions that extensions in additional application schemas are only supported, if the unqualified name of the feature type in the extension is the same as the name of the feature type in the INSPIRE application schema.

Source: Conformance Class 'GML application schemas, Utility and Government Services'

Pre-requisite conformance classes:
  • Conformance Class 'INSPIRE GML application schemas'
ExecutableTestSuite.author: Consortium Bilbomatica, Guadaltel y Geograma

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestCase.label: Basic test
TestCase.description: Verify that the spatial data set contains at least one Utility and Government Services feature.

TestAssertion.label: us-gml.a.1: Utility and Government Services feature in dataset
TestAssertion.description:
Check that the set of features in the spatial data set is not empty.

Source: Abstract Test Case 'Basic test', INSPIRE Data Specification on Utility and Government Services, A.1.1, (A.6.1)
TestAssertion.expression: let $featuresFromAppSchema := $features[ self::us-emf:EnvironmentalManagementFacility || self::us-govserv:GovernmentalService || self::us-net-common:Appurtenance || self::us-net-common:Cabinet || self::us-net-common:Duct || self::us-net-common:Appurtenance || self::us-net-common:Manhole || self::us-net-common:Pipe || self::us-net-common:Pole || self::us-net-common:Tower || self::us-net-common:Appurtenance|| self::us-net-common:Appurtenance|| self::us-net-common:Appurtenance|| self::us-net-common:Appurtenance|| self::us-net-common:UtilityLink || self::us-net-common:UtilityLinkSequence || self::us-net-common:UtilityNetwork || self::us-net-el:ElectricityCable || self::us-net-ogc:OilGasChemicalsPipe || self::us-net-sw:SewerPipe || self::us-net-th:ThermalPipe || self::us-net-wa:WaterPipe ] return (if ($featuresFromAppSchema) then 'PASSED' else 'FAILED', if (not($featuresFromAppSchema)) then local:addMessage('TR.noFeature', map { 'theme': 'Utility and Government Services' }) else ())
